summary: HIGH PRESSURE SIDE NIPPLE, EXITING FUEL PUMP/SENDING UNIT ASSEMBLY CRACKED, SPRAYING UNDERSIDE OF VEHICLE ABOVE FUEL TANK, BELOW REAR SEATS WITH FUEL. THIS AREA IS WELL PROTECTED FROM ROAD DEBRIS AND NO IMPACT DAMAGE IS EVIDENT. VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN IN AN ACCIDENT OF ANY KIND, PURCHASED NEW IN SEPT 2000.    *NLM
